AzureBlade, lying on his back, had had his left leg severed. His 
armor was near to vaporized completely. His face, however, was the 
most horrible of these sights. The left side of it was mauled. 
Destroyed circuitry and cables could be seen in the gashes in it.

AzureBlade: Where are they? Hell Drak and Symphony were with me, where 
are they now???

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Starice::
> 
> Starice heard the scream and ran where Azure Blade was.
> "Are you ok?"said the femme to Azure Blade"By the Matrix!, What 
> happened here???"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > The blast threw AzureBlade back. His armor, already battered, took 
> > more damage. He had not been in the immediate radius, but it shook 
> him 
> > nonetheless.
> > AzureBlade: AAARGHHHHHHHH!!!!!
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > > OOC: My post for Maximal City still stands. However I shall add 
a 
> > bit.
> > > 
> > > BIC: The City's shield's were destroyes as well as external guns 
> and
> > > other weapons. Any bot within 20 feet of the base should be 
> > destroyed or
> > > severly damaged.
